発音ノート - Your Japanese Pronunciation Companion

Master Japanese pronunciation effortlessly with 発音ノート, the ultimate Chrome extension for language learners! As you read Japanese content online, simply select any word that confuses you, and 発音ノート will instantly display the correct pronunciation right above the word. Save these tricky words in your virtual note for quick access and review whenever you need.

Features:

Instant Pronunciation Assistance: Highlight words on any Japanese webpage, and see the pronunciation right away in a popup—perfect for immersive reading without interruption.

Personalized Vocabulary Notebook: Save words to your own list within the extension, building a personalized study resource with every page you read.

Practice Mode: Reinforce what you’ve learned by practicing your saved words, or take on extra vocabulary with built-in JLPT word lists to deepen your skills.

Enhance your Japanese learning journey with 発音ノート! Install now and start building confidence in reading and pronouncing Japanese words today.
